definition: To reduce the length, size, or duration of something, often by removing or omitting certain parts or elements. It is commonly used when referring to shortening or abbreviating texts, numbers, or time periods.

examples.english: I need to shorten my text.
We need to cut our expenses.

examples.german: Der Lehrer kürzte den Aufsatz um die Hälfte.
examples.english: The teacher shortened the essay by half.

examples.german: Die Firma hat die Arbeitszeit gekürzt.
